name: Cyber-Sleuth
description:
I made this for a literary project in school, it's a little rough around the edges but I hope you enjoy!

Cyber-Sleuth is a visual novel type game comparable to Capcom's Ace Attorney series. You follow Darryl Edon as he attempts to save the life of a new friend through the power of the legal system. Tackle big mysteries and unearth the truth in this strange, futuristic world!
